title: The Portrait of a Lady - disadvantage in her life

content.question: The information in the passage suggests that which of the following is a disadvantage in Isabel Archer’s life?

choices.label: The unavailability of worthwhile reading material
The lack of interaction with someone more informed than herself

content.answer: The lack of interaction with someone more informed than herself

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
